Name: Ferrari 812 Competizione
Description: An exclusive limited version Ferrari powered by a v12 of 830 hp and 692 nm.

Name: Bugatti Tourbillon
Description: A stunning hybrid Bugatti powered by a v16 with 1800 hp and 2300 nm, there are only 250 units in the world.

Name: Koenigsegg Regera
Description: This Koenigsegg is a masterpiece with an amazing twin-turbo v8 powered with 1300 hp and 1200 nm, with also another electric motor

Name: Lamborghini Aventador SVJ
Description: This exclusive lambo is powered by a screaming v12 with 770 hp and 720 nm.

Name: Mclaren Senna
Description: Mclaren gave this name to this beautty in honor to Ayrton Senna. This supercar has a twin-turbo v8 with 820hp and 800nm

Name: Porsche 918 Spyder
Description: This exclusive Porsche with only 918 units in the world gives 875 hp and 1280 nm by a v8 engine with 2 electric motors

Name: Pagani Huayra
Description: A super unique piece designed by Horacio Pagani and powered by an AMG v12 engine with 900 hp and 770 nm.

Name: Brabus G-Wagon
Description: A luxury SUV modified by Brabus powered by a twin-turbo v8 with 910 hp and 1250 nm.

Name: Ferrari 488 Pista
Description: A very fun driving supercar. Ferrari powered it with a twin-turbo v8 with 720 hp and 770 nm

Name: Lamborghini Huracan STO
Description: The race version of the default lambo huracan. powered by an atmospheric v10 with 640 hp and 565 nm
